course_name: Mathematics-Basics to Advanced for Data Science And GenAI
content:
"I previously held a negative opinion of this individual because I felt his explanations were overly theoretical, relying on lengthy notes without demonstrating genuine insight. This was further exacerbated by what I perceived as his students' ostentatious displays on social media, flaunting his supposed hard work or merely mimicking information. Consequently, I sought an alternative learning method and enrolled in this course. To my surprise, his teaching reflected his own learning process, which I found remarkably effective. While I may be mistaken in my initial assessment, I feel powerless to influence those who engage in such self-aggrandizement. I successfully completed this course without extensive note-taking, as he thoughtfully provided comprehensive materials. Instead, I focused on conducting my own experiments with each topic, avoiding rote memorization. He understands that students should not simply act as "xerox machines," which I appreciate. Overall, I thoroughly enjoyed learning from Krish, and I highly recommend his course to anyone who shares a similar learning style. 
Thank you, Krish !"

course_name: Mathematics-Basics to Advanced for Data Science And GenAI
content: I can't this is not useful. BUTTTT, nobody should waste their time on this. 23hrs...oh my god. Math is an interesting subject. How much more boring you cant get!!!   I didnt take this course for the "what is what" definitions and "lhs=rhs" stuffs. I wanted to hear about the science behind it - "WHY" and "HOW" would have very very interesting.  you didnt even explain how you arrived at (x minus proj.x on L). How shallow!!!!!   You don't seem to be teaching that at all...  you spent a lot of time in useless shallow stuffs. In the name of applications you waste a lot in all the videos and also i can see that you have separate sections for applications separately. How shallow!!!!    This kinda teaching method is why india has fewer no. of guys who really know what they are doing.  I am sorry, krish. You should stop at being guy who gives roadmap and guidance. Please stop giving technical lectures.

course_name: Mathematics-Basics to Advanced for Data Science And GenAI
content: Course is good, but some things could have been a lot better, I thought the probability part was not up to the mark, and the videos did not feel connected after calculus. Still, the best and most important part of statistics was well taught, but do not expect any Python explanation of those topics overall, a good course for the price. Still, if you have a lot of time, there are better places to learn, but if you have less time, I think this course does a pretty good job so that you can get started in the data field.

It covers a wide range of topics, including linear algebra, statistics, differential equations, and derivatives, with practical applications in machine learning and neural networks. The explanations are clear, and the examples are highly relevant. A must for anyone building a strong math foundation for data science and AI!

course_name: Mathematics-Basics to Advanced for Data Science And GenAI
content: The good thing and the bad thing about this course are same. All throughout the course, the simplicity and slightly "imperfect" method of teaching made sure that someone even with zero background of Advance Mathematics is able to grasp the things and doesn't get overwhelmed by it. But at the same time, when someone with a good background observes harmless mistakes in formulas and methods repeatedly, they are tend to lose trust over the instructor and the content being taught. That's what happened to me by the end of this course. Hope to have better well prepared courses from Krish given the excellent background he has!

content: The course is okayish! Could be more technical and include vector spaces of multiple dimensions while explaining the concepts. course_name: Mathematics-Basics to Advanced for Data Science And GenAI
content:
Highly Recommended.
I recently completed this Mathematics-Basics to Advance course for Data Science and GenAI and I'm completely satisfied with the course. The instructor has a remarkable ability to explain complex concepts clearly, always grounding the material with practical examples related to the data science, data analytics, machine learning (my favorite) and deep learning.

Each topic is presented in a way that emphasizes its relevance to real-world applications, making the learning process both engaging and practical. 

Overall, this course is an excellent resource for anyone looking to strengthen their mathematical foundation for data science.

Thank You Krish for such an amazing content and material.

course_name: Mathematics-Basics to Advanced for Data Science And GenAI
content:
I come from a commerce background and wanted to transition into the field of data science and analytics. Initially, I had doubts about whether I should enroll in this course, but I ultimately decided to take the leapâ€”and now, Iâ€™m incredibly grateful for making one of the best decisions of my life.

This course covers everything required to become a data scientist or analyst. All the concepts are explained with real-world examples, which is one of the best aspects of this course. In school, we were never taught why we were studying specific topics, but here, Krish Sir breaks down complex ideas so simply that even a 5-year-old could understand them.

Iâ€™m especially thankful to Krish Sir for creating this course at such an affordable price (it costs less than a medium-sized pizza!).

If youâ€™re serious about gaining a strong understanding of how math and statistics work in data science, I highly recommend enrolling in this course.

Thank you again, Krish Sir, for putting together this wonderful course!

course_name: Mathematics-Basics to Advanced for Data Science And GenAI
content:
I am currently taking the "Mathematics for Data Science" course by Krish Naik on Udemy, and I am thoroughly impressed with the quality and depth of the content. Even though I havenâ€™t completed the course yet, I can already see the value it offers.

Content Coverage
So far, the course has provided a solid introduction to the mathematical concepts that are foundational to data science, such as linear algebra, calculus, and probability. Krish Naik does an excellent job of presenting these topics in a way that is both comprehensive and accessible.

Teaching Style
One of the aspects I appreciate most is Krish's teaching style. He uses straightforward, real-world examples to illustrate complex mathematical ideas, making them much easier to understand. His explanations are clear and concise, and he avoids overwhelming students with technical jargon.

Course Structure
The course is well-organized, with each topic building logically on the previous one. The videos are long but interesting, which makes it easy to fit learning into my schedule. Although I havenâ€™t finished the course yet, the structure so far has made it easy to follow and retain the information.

Practical Application
Even at this stage, the course has demonstrated a strong emphasis on practical application. Krish connects the mathematical concepts to real-world data science problems, helping me understand not just the theory, but how to apply it in practice.

Accessibility
Iâ€™ve found the course to be highly accessible. Krish has a talent for breaking down complex topics into simple, manageable parts, making the content approachable for learners at all levels. Even if youâ€™re not strong in math, his explanations make it easier to grasp the key concepts.

Overall Impression
Overall, my experience with the "Mathematics for Data Science" course by Krish Naik has been very positive. Itâ€™s a well-rounded course that is helping me build a strong mathematical foundation for data science. Iâ€™m looking forward to completing the course and applying what Iâ€™ve learned to real-world data science projects. You deserve the 5 star rating.
